sql-info.sql-name: 大额存单产品分类合计
sql-info.sql-value: select T2.TD_PD_NO AS 产品编码 ,T3.TD_PD_NAME As 产品名称 ,sum(T1.DEPBAL) AS 余额 from S_DEP_TD_ACCOUNT_D T1 left join F_DEP_TDMCDRGB T2 on T1.ACCTNBR = T2.TD_TD_ACCT_NO left join F_DEP_TDMCDMCD T3 on T2.TD_PD_NO = NVL(T3.TD_CODE, '') || T3.TD_1LVL_BRH_ID ||T3.TD_YR ||'00'|| T3.TD_DEP_PRD||'00' || T3.TD_TNRNO where T1.STATDATE = '@statdate' and T1.CCYNBR = 'CNY' and T1.PRDCODE in ( '999TD000208','999TD110908' ) group by T2.TD_PD_NO , T3.TD_PD_NAME having sum(T1.DEPBAL) > 0

select T1.CI_CHN_NAME AS 客户名称 ,T1.CI_CUST_NO AS 客户编号 , CASE T1.CI_SEX WHEN '1' THEN 'm' WHEN '2' THEN 'f' ELSE T1.CI_SEX END AS 性别 , CASE WHEN T1.CI_RES_CNTY in ( '156' ,'X' ) THEN 'CHN'ELSE T1.CI_RES_CNTY END AS 国籍 ,T1.CI_CUST_TYP AS 客户类别 ,T1.CI_OCCUP_COD AS 职业 ,T3.CI_ADDR AS 住址 ,T3.CI_MOBILE_PHONE AS 移动电话 , CASE T2.EC_CER_TYP WHEN '0' THEN '1' WHEN '1' THEN '2' WHEN '105' THEN '99' WHEN '106' THEN '99' WHEN '2001' THEN '99' WHEN '21' THEN '3' WHEN '22' THEN '3' WHEN '3' THEN '4' WHEN '4' THEN '4' WHEN '5' THEN '99' WHEN '6' THEN '99' WHEN 'X' THEN '99' ELSE T2.EC_CER_TYP END AS 客户证件类型 ,T2.EC_CER_NO AS 客户证件号码 ,T1.CI_WOKG_UNIT_NAME AS 工作单位 from F_CI_CICIFCIF T1 left join F_CI_ECCIFIDI T2 on T1.CI_CUST_NO = T2.EC_CUST_NO and T2.EC_PRI_CER_FLG = 'Y' -- 主证件号 left join F_CI_CICIFADR T3 on T1.CI_CUST_NO = T3.FK_CICIF_KEY where T1.CI_CUST_TYP = 1 -- 客户类别

select T1.CI_CHN_NAME AS 企业名称 ,T1.CI_CUST_NO AS 企业编号 ,T2.EC_CER_TYP AS 企业证件类型 ,T2.EC_CER_NO AS 企业证件号码 ,T4.EC_FULL_NAM AS 法人姓名 ,CASE T4.EC_CER_TYP WHEN '0' THEN '1' WHEN '1' THEN '2' WHEN '105' THEN '99' WHEN '106' THEN '99' WHEN '2001' THEN '99' WHEN '21' THEN '3' WHEN '22' THEN '3' WHEN '3' THEN '4' WHEN '4' THEN '4' WHEN '5' THEN '99' WHEN '6' THEN '99' WHEN 'X' THEN '99' ELSE T2.EC_CER_TYP END AS 法人证件类型 ,T4.EC_CER_NO AS 法人证件号码 ,'' AS 上级 from F_CI_CICIECIF T1 left join F_CI_ECCIFIDI T2 on T1.CI_CUST_NO = T2.EC_CUST_NO and T2.EC_PRI_CER_FLG = 'Y' -- 主证件号 left join F_CI_ECCIFCCR T3 on T1.CI_CUST_NO = T3.EC_CUST_ID_A and T3.EC_REL_TYP = '01' -- 企业法人 left join F_CI_ECCIFIDI T4 on T3.EC_CUST_ID_B = T4.EC_CUST_NO and T4.EC_PRI_CER_FLG = 'Y' -- 主证件号 where T1.CI_CUST_TYP = 2 -- 客户类别 and T1.CI_CUST_NO not in ( -- 个体工商户贷款 SELECT custid FROM EDW.S_LN_XDBL_ACCOUNT_D T1 WHERE STATDATE = '2017-04-30' AND LEFT(T1.CUSTID, 1) = '2' AND T1.INDUSTRYPRO = '12' AND LEFT(T1.ITEMCODE, 4) = '1303' -- 个体工商户 科目入在 农村企业贷款
union all
select CLTNBR from edw.S_DEP_SA_ACCOUNT_D where STATDATE = '2017-04-30' and itemcode in ( -- 个体工商户 select subjcode from edw.F_CM_GL_CW_KM where subjname like '%个体工商户%' and left(subjcode,1) = '2' and length(subjcode) = 8 )
union all
select CLTNBR from edw.S_DEP_TD_ACCOUNT_D where STATDATE = '2017-04-30' and itemcode in ( -- 个体工商户 select subjcode from edw.F_CM_GL_CW_KM where subjname like '%个体工商户%' and left(subjcode,1) = '2' and length(subjcode) = 8 ) )

select T1.CI_CHN_NAME AS 企业名称 ,T1.CI_CUST_NO AS 企业编号 ,T4.EC_FULL_NAM AS 法人姓名 ,CASE T4.EC_CER_TYP WHEN '0' THEN '1' WHEN '1' THEN '2' WHEN '105' THEN '99' WHEN '106' THEN '99' WHEN '2001' THEN '99' WHEN '21' THEN '3' WHEN '22' THEN '3' WHEN '3' THEN '4' WHEN '4' THEN '4' WHEN '5' THEN '99' WHEN '6' THEN '99' WHEN 'X' THEN '99' ELSE T2.EC_CER_TYP END AS 法人证件类型 ,T4.EC_CER_NO AS 法人证件号码 from F_CI_CICIECIF T1 left join F_CI_ECCIFIDI T2 on T1.CI_CUST_NO = T2.EC_CUST_NO and T2.EC_PRI_CER_FLG = 'Y' -- 主证件号 left join F_CI_ECCIFCCR T3 on T1.CI_CUST_NO = T3.EC_CUST_ID_A and T3.EC_REL_TYP = '01' -- 企业法人 left join F_CI_ECCIFIDI T4 on T3.EC_CUST_ID_B = T4.EC_CUST_NO and T4.EC_PRI_CER_FLG = 'Y' -- 主证件号 where T1.CI_CUST_TYP = 2 -- 客户类别 and T1.CI_CUST_NO in ( -- 个体工商户贷款 SELECT custid FROM EDW.S_LN_XDBL_ACCOUNT_D T1 WHERE STATDATE = '2017-04-30' AND LEFT(T1.CUSTID, 1) = '2' AND T1.INDUSTRYPRO = '12' AND LEFT(T1.ITEMCODE, 4) = '1303' -- 个体工商户 科目入在 农村企业贷款
union all
select CLTNBR from edw.S_DEP_SA_ACCOUNT_D where STATDATE = '2017-04-30' and itemcode in ( -- 个体工商户 select subjcode from edw.F_CM_GL_CW_KM where subjname like '%个体工商户%' and left(subjcode,1) = '2' and length(subjcode) = 8 )
union all
select CLTNBR from edw.S_DEP_TD_ACCOUNT_D where STATDATE = '2017-04-30' and itemcode in ( -- 个体工商户 select subjcode from edw.F_CM_GL_CW_KM where subjname like '%个体工商户%' and left(subjcode,1) = '2' and length(subjcode) = 8 ) )

select REPLACE(T1.sjrq,'-','') AS 数据日期 ,T1.xh As 序号 ,CASE WHEN T1.khxm = '' THEN '0' ELSE T1.khxm END As 客户名称 ,CASE WHEN T1.khh = '' THEN '0' ELSE T1.khh END As 客户号 ,T1.kmh AS 科目, T1.kmmc As 科目名称, T1.ckzh AS 帐号, 0 AS 计息标识, CASE T1.bz WHEN '01' THEN 'CNY' WHEN '14' THEN 'USD' ELSE T1.bz END AS 币种 , T1.ckye AS 余额 ,0 AS 积数 ,0 AS 利息 ,0 AS 计息天数 ,T1.ll AS 应付利息 ,T1.ckye + T1.ll AS 本息合计 from sche.qd1 T1 left join ( select EC_CUST_NO , min(EC_CER_TYP) AS EC_CER_TYP , MAX(EC_CER_NO) AS EC_CER_NO from ( select EC_CUST_NO , EC_CER_TYP ,EC_CER_NO from F_CI_ECCIFIDI where EC_PRI_CER_FLG = 'Y'
union
select SA_CUST_NO, SA_CERT_TYP , SA_CERT_ID from F_DEP_SAACNACN
union
select TD_CUST_NO, TD_CERT_TYP , TD_CERT_ID from F_DEP_TDACNACN ) group by EC_CUST_NO ) T2 on t1.khh = T2.EC_CUST_NO order by integer(T1.xh) asc

SELECT CUSTTP ,COUNT(CASE WHEN APPLAMT <= 500000 THEN IDNO ELSE NULL END) ,SUM(CASE WHEN APPLAMT <= 500000 THEN APPLAMT ELSE 0 END) ,COUNT(CASE WHEN APPLAMT > 500000 THEN IDNO ELSE NULL END) ,SUM(CASE WHEN APPLAMT > 500000 THEN APPLAMT ELSE 0 END) FROM ( SELECT CUSTTP,IDNO,SUM(cast(char(APPLAMT) as bigint))/100 AS APPLAMT FROM EDW.F_FIN_SALEINFO WHERE PRODSDATE <= '@date' AND PRODEDATE > '@date' AND REMVFLAG = '0' AND BACKFLAG = '0' AND CUSTSTATE = '1' GROUP BY CUSTTP,IDNO ) GROUP BY CUSTTP

sql-info.sql-name: 高管活期积数, 余额
sql-info.sql-value: SELECT A.SA_ACCT_NO ,A.SA_CUST_NO ,SUM(CASE WHEN H.ENDDATE<= '@endDate' AND H.STARTDATE> '@startDate' THEN (DAYS(DATE(H.ENDDATE))-DAYS(DATE(H.STARTDATE)))*H.DEPBAL WHEN H.ENDDATE> '@endDate' AND H.STARTDATE> '@startDate' THEN (DAYS(DATE('@endDate'))-DAYS(DATE(H.STARTDATE))+1)*H.DEPBAL WHEN H.ENDDATE> '@endDate' AND H.STARTDATE<= '@startDate' THEN (DAYS(DATE('@endDate'))-DAYS(DATE('@startDate')))*H.DEPBAL WHEN H.ENDDATE<= '@endDate' AND H.STARTDATE<= '@startDate' THEN (DAYS(DATE(H.ENDDATE))-DAYS(DATE('@startDate'))-1)*H.DEPBAL ELSE 0 END) as 活期积数 ,SUM(CASE WHEN H.STARTDATE<= '@endDate' and H.ENDDATE> '@endDate' THEN H.DEPBAL ELSE 0 END) as 活期余额 FROM F_DEP_SAACNACN A INNER JOIN S_DEP_SA_ACCOUNT_HIS H ON A.SA_ACCT_NO=H.ACCTNBR AND H.ENDDATE> '@startDate' AND H.STARTDATE<= '@endDate' AND A.SA_CERT_ID IN ('320624196510038072' ,'432822196602104052' ,'320802197502121519' ,'320520195808022430' ,'320626196312257445' ,'32068119840817009X' ,'32052519570801067X' ,'320525196309075665' ,'320626196711140447' ,'320626196106170031' ,'320626196304134816' ,'320626197409269615' ,'320626197410233214' ,'320626196705054016' ,'320681197701241235' ,'320625197002125197') GROUP BY A.SA_ACCT_NO,A.SA_CUST_NO HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN H.ENDDATE<= '@endDate' AND H.STARTDATE> '@startDate' THEN (DAYS(DATE(H.ENDDATE))-DAYS(DATE(H.STARTDATE)))*H.DEPBAL WHEN H.ENDDATE> '@endDate' AND H.STARTDATE> '@startDate' THEN (DAYS(DATE('@endDate'))-DAYS(DATE(H.STARTDATE))+1)*H.DEPBAL WHEN H.ENDDATE> '@endDate' AND H.STARTDATE<= '@startDate' THEN (DAYS(DATE('@endDate'))-DAYS(DATE('@startDate')))*H.DEPBAL WHEN H.ENDDATE<= '@endDate' AND H.STARTDATE<= '@startDate' THEN (DAYS(DATE(H.ENDDATE))-DAYS(DATE('@startDate'))-1)*H.DEPBAL ELSE 0 END) >0 ORDER BY 3 asc

WITH F_GRYHKHFL_PARAM -- 证件信息准确但同一证件开立不同户名 AS ( SELECT CS.BRNMGR ,br.BRNNAME ,CS.ACCTNBR ,CERT_ID ,CARDNBR ,CLTNBR ,CLTNM ,DEPBAL FROM edw.S_DEP_SA_ACCOUNT_D_BASE CS left join EDW.DICT_BRANCH br on CS.BRNMGR = br.BRNNBR WHERE LENGTH (CERT_ID) = 18 AND CERT_ID IS NOT NULL AND CERT_ID NOT LIKE '%1111111111111111%' AND CERT_ID NOT LIKE '%9999999999999999%' AND CERT_ID NOT LIKE '%0000000000000000%' AND CERT_TYP IN ('0' , '1' ) ) select min(机构号||' '||机构名) AS 机构 ,客户号 AS 客户号 ,客户姓名 AS 客户姓名 ,证件号 AS 证件号 ,min(性别 ) AS 性别 ,min(工作单位 ) AS 工作单位 ,min(联系电话 ) AS 联系电话 ,min(地址 ) AS 地址 from (
select BRNMGR AS 机构号 , BRNNAME AS 机构名 ,CLTNBR AS 客户号 ,CLTNM AS 客户姓名 ,ACCTNBR AS 账号 ,CARDNBR AS 卡号 ,CERT_ID AS 证件号 ,CASE T4.CI_SEX WHEN '1' THEN '男' WHEN '2' THEN '女' ELSE null END AS 性别 ,T4.CI_WOKG_UNIT_NAME AS 工作单位 ,T4.PHONE AS 联系电话 ,T4.CI_ADDR AS 地址 from F_GRYHKHFL_PARAM P left join ( -- 对私客户信息 select T1.CI_CUST_NO , max(T1.CI_SEX) AS CI_SEX , max(T1.CI_WOKG_UNIT_NAME) As CI_WOKG_UNIT_NAME , max(CASE WHEN NVL(T2.CI_MOBILE_PHONE, '') = '' THEN T2.CI_TEL_NO ELSE T2.CI_MOBILE_PHONE END ) AS PHONE , max(T2.CI_ADDR) AS CI_ADDR from edw.F_CI_CICIFCIF T1 left join F_CI_CICIFADR T2 on T1.CI_CUST_NO = T2.FK_CICIF_KEY group by T1.CI_CUST_NO ) T4 ON P.CLTNBR = T4.CI_CUST_NO where nvl(T4.PHONE,'') = '' and p.ACCTNBR not in ( select ACCTNBR from ( --证件信息准确但同一证件开立不同户名 -已核实账户数 -- select p.ACCTNBR from EDW.F_GRYHKHFL_PARAM p INNER JOIN ( select SA_ACCT_NO from EDW.F_CI_ECCIFIDI cif inner join EDW.F_CBOD_SAACNCAT cat on cif.EC_CUST_NO = cat.SA_CUST_NO where cat.SA_RESULT ='2' and (cif.EC_ID_CHK_FLG ='00' or cif.EC_ID_CHK_FLG='01') ) a on p.ACCTNBR =A.SA_ACCT_NO
UNION ALL
--(11)证件信息准确但同一证件开立不同户名 -撤销账户数 -- select p.ACCTNBR from EDW.F_GRYHKHFL_PARAM p INNER JOIN EDW.F_DEP_SAACNACN SA ON p.ACCTNBR =SA.SA_ACCT_NO where SA.SA_CACCT_DT <> '1800-01-01'
UNION ALL
--(12)证件信息准确但同一证件开立不同户名 -转久悬账户数 -- select p.ACCTNBR from EDW.F_GRYHKHFL_PARAM p INNER JOIN EDW.F_DEP_SAACNACN SA ON p.ACCTNBR =SA.SA_ACCT_NO where SA.SA_DEP_TYP ='98' ) ) ) group by 客户号 ,客户姓名 ,证件号
